text: After some years they will form an alliance, and the daughter of the king of the South will go to the king of the North to seal the agreement. But his daughter will not retain her position of power, nor will his strength 11:6 Or offspring endure. At that time she will be given up, along with her royal escort and her father 11:6 Or child; see Vulgate and Syriac. and the one who supported her.
